description: Bull Matthews runs into Tom Mitchell in the cafeteria and lets him know that he saw what went on in the showers the other day.  Tad Brady comes into the cafeteria and Tom tells Bull that he fucked Tad last week.  Bull makes eye contact with Tad and Tad can't ignore the lump in Bull's shorts.  Tad wants to blow Bull so Tom locks the door to the cafeteria.  Tad is put onto a cafeteria table and easily works off the soda and chips he had as the bottom boy for Tom and Bull.
title: Spring Training
